actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs, Alcohol.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs and Alcoholism

official_title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to expand the VISTA program by 1993 to enable more individuals, particularly young adults, to become volunteers in Service to America, and for other purposes.

summary.text: VISTA Expansion Act of 1989 - Amends the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations in increasing amounts for FY 1990 through 1993 for the Volunteers in Service to America (VISTA) program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to expand the VISTA program by 1993 to enable more individuals, particularly young adults, to become volunteers in Service to America, and for other purposes.
